ygData.subject: Gnome Necros
ygData.msgSnippet: Faction wise gnomes are better and easier to deal with. Stats Wise that is completly false. Dark Elves make the best Necromancer s in the game. Also another
ygData.messageBody:
Faction wise gnomes are better and easier to deal with. Stats Wise that is completly false. Dark Elves make the best Necromancer's in the game. Also another pro if being a Dark Elf Necro is tha they get an exp bonus for that paticular Race/Class combo.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer Level 21


-Gnomes have the best stats for a necro. You will be KOS in some good towns
-but I have found that it is easier to raise your faction than say a DE
-necro.

-<-- Enigma -->
-http://members.door.net/enigma
